Ship.Name: Koonya
Ship.Description: A steamboat that ran aground off Cronulla Beach.

Ship.Name: Hazard
Ship.Description: A sloop that ran aground on Box Head.

Ship.Name: South Australian
Ship.Description: A brig-sloop and former RN vessel (the HMS Swallow) that was wrecked at Encounter Bay.

Ship.Name: Geltwood
Ship.Description: A barque that struck a reef near the northern end of Lake Bonney.

Ship.Name: Falls of Halladale
Ship.Description: A barque that ran onto the rocks near Peterborough.

Ship.Name: Cataraqui
Ship.Description: 400 lost when wrecked on King Island.

Ship.Name: Sydney Cove
Ship.Description: Sank at Preservation Island with no loss of life.

Ship.Name: Adonis
Ship.Description: A brigantine that sank off Crowdy Head.

Ship.Name: SS Lindus
Ship.Description: A steamship that was wrecked in a storm off Newcastle.
